page.title: 13An interview with the Vicar
page.content: When asked if the number of people coming to church had increased or decreased through the years he replied,"Decreased while I've been working.It is mostly{retired}people that come to church because they have more time." He said that it was mostly {women}that came to church.He said that if he hadn't become a vicar he would like to have been a teacher,teaching {modern language}.His favourite hymn is{'Alleluia,sing to Jesus'}.We asked about sport and he said that he used to play{cricket}and{hockey}but he doesn't play any now because most sports are played on a weekend when he is working.He goes on holiday for a few weeks in the summer and for a couple of days after{Christmas}and{ {Easter}.
